subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Oilers used their third straight No. 1 draft pick to take Nail Yakupov, from Tartarstan, and two brothers were reunited when Pittsburgh traded Jordan Stall to Carolina.
snippet: The Oilers used their third straight No. 1 draft pick to take Nail Yakupov, from Tartarstan, and two brothers were reunited when Pittsburgh traded Jordan Stall to Carolina.
